meaningMnemonic: <kanji>Proceed</kanji> to a new place to do your <kanji>duty</kanji>. That's just a fancy way to say you're about to <vocabulary>move for a different job</vocabulary>. This is usually a job at the same company you're already at, it's just a different position for you.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
